description: '''Amapiano''' is a genre of music from South Africa that became popular in mid-[[2010s in music|2012]] with an earlier regular occurrence on South African radio stations in the early 2000s. It is a hybrid of kwaito,  [[deep house]], [[gqom]], [[jazz]], [[Soul music|soul]], and [[Lounge music|lounge]] music characterized by [[synthesizer|synths]] and wide, percussive [[bassline]]s. The word "amapiano" derives from the [[IsiZulu]] word for "[[piano]]s".
